event.name: PCGN Project Showcase: The Co-Design Process
event.shortDescription: Join us on Thursday, October 28th @ 12pm to learn about our most recent Co-Design Projects and engage with the prototypes.

description.html: Join us on Thursday, October 28th @ 12pm to learn about our most recent Co-Design Projects and engage with the prototypes!
